onboarding.purpose: Determine user mode (single/household/caregiver), personalize UI, and drive feature discovery.

screens.question: Who will you primarily be managing?

optionDescriptions.myself: Just tracking my own health and wellness
optionDescriptions.family: Managing health for family members (spouse, children, parents, etc.)

optionDescriptions.body_fitness: Track weight, exercise, body composition, and fitness goals (whether gaining, losing, or maintaining)
optionDescriptions.nutrition_kitchen: Plan meals with AI analysis, discover recipes, smart shopping lists, and pantry tracking
optionDescriptions.health_medical: Track appointments, medications, vital signs (blood pressure, glucose, etc.), and health records

screens.question: How do you get your food?

optionDescriptions.i_cook_at_home: I cook at home (need recipes, shopping lists)
optionDescriptions.meal_delivery: Meal delivery services (need quick meal tracking)
optionDescriptions.meal_kits: Meal kit services (need simple ingredient tracking)
optionDescriptions.self: I cook and shop for myself
optionDescriptions.others: Someone else cooks for me (e.g., family member, caregiver)
optionDescriptions.shared: We share cooking and shopping duties
optionDescriptions.delivery: I use delivery services (Instacart, DoorDash, etc.)

screens.question: How do you want to log meals?
screens.subtitle: Select all that apply

optionDescriptions.photo: Take photos of meals for AI-powered analysis
optionDescriptions.manual: Manually enter food items and portions
optionDescriptions.both: Use both photo and manual logging
optionDescriptions.with_reminders: Get reminders to log meals at meal times

screens.question: Do you want the app to ask for updates if you forget?

optionDescriptions.yes: Send me notifications if I haven't logged meals, weight, etc.
optionDescriptions.no: I'll log things on my own schedule

screens.question: Would you like to add anyone now?
screens.subtitle: You can always add family members later

optionDescriptions.yes: I'm ready to add family members now
